replies.msg:
We have no choice!!

Hongkongers are now in a fight against not just the HK police... but also violent mobs instigated by China. For over two months Chinese perpetrators in civilian clothing followed and assaulted pro-democracy citizens on the way home after every peaceful protest... In complete liaison with the HK police and even if caught were released right away without charge. We have no choice but to fight for democracy with our blood, like every other democracy from your history book!!

#StandWithHongKong #AntiChinazi

https://lihkg.com/thread/1587590/page/1
